text: لِّيَسۡـَٔلَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدۡقِهِمۡۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

translation.en: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment
translation.id: (agar Dia menanyakan kepada orang-orang yang benar tentang kebenaran mereka.669) Dia menyediakan azab yang pedih bagi orang-orang kafir
